title: Quinn's age? How old is she? @Ironstylus
body: I seem to recall you saying she was in her mid to late thirties? Am arguing with a friend about it.. but sadly cannot find where you mentioned it. Halp!

replies.body:
Erm, I don't think she'd be in her 30's. I'm in my 30's. It's far too old. Believe me.


But anyway, if I had to make a really uneducated guess I'd say she'd probably be in her early-mid 20's. I think of her as akin to Katniss from the Hunger Games, but Katniss is like.. 16 I think. That's a bit too young-adult-fictiony, but Quinn could be be in the 18-24 range I think, depending on what we'd do with developing her story.

Sorry, still learning how these forums work. v.v; Just saw that you responded! Thanks. I'd always thought she looked to be in her 20's but again.. I swore you mentioned her being older at some point. 


<3 Quinn!
She doesn't look any older than twenty, TBH. But then again, Riot won't tell actual ages because people will get pissed, no matter what.
Guess the joke's on me. XD

I doubt mods will delete this now that there's a red post, but I'd like to suggest that next time, it be made in the "Champions & Gameplay" board :)

Seems more appropriate.
